nrich , 20 June 1994 .

Chris Helgen, 11 January 1994 .
· Belgrade Tanjug, 11 January 94. FBIS London LD1101132394,
111323Z Jan 94 .
* Zagreb Radio , 11 January 94. FBIS London LD1101151994, 111519Z
Jan 94 .
3 Reuters, “Serbs Planning Offensive on Bihac - Croat Commander,"
27 January 1994.
6 O'Shea, Brendan, Crisis at Bihac : Bosnia's Bloody Battlefield, UK :
Sutton Publishing , 1998. p . 35 .
? Reuters, “ Sarajevo Ultimatum Fails to Stop Bosnia Fighting," 21 Feb

ruary
1994
.
33 Zagreb Globus, “ The Command of the 5th Corps of the Bosnia
Herzegovina Army Announces : We Will Enter Velika Kladusa and Put
Fikret Abdic on Trial As a Traitor, " by Karl Jeger, 19 August 1994 .
FBIS Vienna AU2508104794, 2510472 Aug 94 .
Sarajevo Ljiljan , Interview With Brigade Commander Hamdija
Abdic, “ The War Comedy in Which We Made a Jackass Out of Fikret
Abdic," by Mustafa Borovic and Mirsad Sinanovic, 4 October 1995 .
FBIS Reston VA , 96BA0015D , 020323Z Feb 96.
35 Sarajevo Televizija Bosne i Herzegovina, 7 July 1996. FBIS London
LD0707214696 , 072146Z Jul 96.
• Sarajevo Prva Linija , “ The Anniversary of the Formation of the
517th Liberation - Light Brigade, 15 August 1997 : On the Road to Free
dom " by Z. Seferagic, September 1997. FBIS Reston VA , 96E08028A ,
151724Z Jan 98.
37 Reuters, “ Bosnians Enter Last Week to Decide on Peace Plan ," by
Kurt Schork, 11 July 1994 .
38 Reuters, “ Troops From Moslem Enclave Clash With Serbs,” 14 July
1994 .
39 Reuters, “ UN Comes Under Fire in Fierce Bihac Battle ,” 30 July
1994 .
40 The narrative is based primarily on Sarajevo Radio reports from
7 July and 11 July to 15 July 1994 and Paris AFP reports from 11
13 July and 15 July.
41 The 1st Dravar, 3rd Petrovac, and 17th Kljuc Light Infantry Brigades
were the main VRS combat formations.
42 Nevzad Djeric had previously been commander of the ARBiH 503rd
Cazin Brigade .
43 Abdic declined a UN offer to evacuate the town's civilian population,
reasoning that if the town's population left Pecigrad's defenders would
see no reason to carry on the fight. Reuters, “ Inter-Moslem   Fighting
Traps Up to 2,000 Civilians," by Richard Meares, 4 August 1994 .
44 Reuters , “ Separatist Bosnian Moslem Leader Vows to Fight On" by
Davor Huic , 10 August 1994 .
45 Reuters, " Moslem Rebels Surrender as Bosnian Town Falls," by
Richard Meares, 4 August 1994 .
46 Reuters, “ Moslems, Serbs Send More Troops to Battle Zone," by
Mark Heinrich, 11 August 1994 .
47 Reuters, “Rebel Moslem Leader Tries to Rally Forces,” by Davor
Huic, 12 August 1994 .
Reuters, “ Bosnian Government Troops Crush Abdic Revolt," by
Mark Heinrich , 21 August 1994 .
49 There are conflicting reports regarding the behavior of the 5th Corps
forces that occupied the town after 11 months of fighting. UN observ
ers initially reported that they were disciplined and professional, taking
the town with a minimum of casualties and causing little damage dur
ing and after the attack. Reuters , " Moslem Refugees Block French UN
Troops," by Davor Huic, 23 Aug 1994. But later reports from Abdic
refugees and at least one UN observer maintained that Bosnian Army
troops had fired on retreating Abdic soldiers and civilians as they fled
Velika Kladusa. Reuters, “Refugees Accuse Bosnian Forces of Kill
ings " by Davor Huic , 24 August 1994.
50 Reuters, “ Bosnian Government Troops Crush Abdic Revolt," by
Mark Heinrich, 21 August 1994.
a
16
* See the section “ Ending the War? Bosnian Serb Offensive Operations ,
November 1993 to March 1994" for additional details .
' O'Shea, Brendan , Crisis at Bihac: Bosnia's Bloody Battlefield . UK :
Sutton Publishing, 1998. p. 63 .
10 Reuters, " Bosnian Radio Reports Fighting in Gorazde, ” 21 April
1994 .
" Reuters, “ U.N. Says Fighting Decreases With Bosnian Ceasefire ," by
Kurt Schork , 11 June 1994 .
12 Reuters , “ Bosnian Ceasefire Gradually Taking Hold — UN , ” by Kurt
Schork , 11 June 1994 .
13 Reuters, “ U.N. Says Fighting Decreases With Bosnian Ceasefire ," by
Kurt Schork , 11 June 1994 .
14 O'Shea , Brendan , Crisis at Bihac: Bosnia's Bloody Battlefield. UK :
Sutton Publishing , 1998. p. 71-72 .
Is Reuters, “ Bihac Fighting Dims Hope of Bosnia Truce Lasting," by
Kurt Schork , 14 June 1994 .
Reuters, “ Fierce Bihac Fighting Adds to Peace Doubts , ” by Kurt
Schork , 15 June 1994 .
1 ? Reuters, “ Rival Moslem Forces Fight in Bosnia ,” by Kurt Schork,
16 June 1994 .
18 Reuters, "Sarajevo Forces Advance in Bihac Conflict," by Mark Hei
nrich , 20 June 1994 .

nrich , 20 June 1994 .
20 Reuters, “ Bihac Fighting Continues as Bosnia Truce Falters " by Kurt
Schork , 18 June 1994 .
21 Reuters, “ Rebel Moslems Count on Serb Help Against Enemy Kin ,"
by Mark Heinrich , 22 June 1994.
22 Reuters , “ Bosnian Government Forces Attack Rebel Moslems” by
Mark Heinrich , 22 June 1992 .
23 Reuters , “ Army Attack on Moslem   Kin Will Fail -Rebel Tycoon ,"
by Mark Heinrich , 23 June 1994 .
24 Reuters , “ Serbs Give Heavy Weapons to Rebel Moslems, " by Davor
Huic, 30 June 1994 .
25 Reuters, “ Bosnian Army Surrounds UN Compound in Bihac,” 7 July
1994 .
26 Reuters, “ Moslem Troops Hold Aid Workers in Bosnia " by Mark
Heinrich , 7 July 1994.
27 Reuters , “ Rebel Moslems, Serbs Jointly Attack Bosnian Army" by
Mark Heinrich , 10 July 1994 .
2% Reuters , “ Bosnian Army Stages Mock Mutiny to Flush Out Rebels ,”
by Mark Heinrich, 10 July 1994 .

0921567 Jul 94 .

Jul 94 .

Karlo Jeger, 15 July 1994. FBIS Vienna AU 1907203394 , 192033Z Jul
94 .

231136Z Aug 94 .
